title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 51.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 51.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

Subdivision 35 of section
375
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law provides that after January 1, 1971, the

Commissioner of Motor Vehicles may establish standards for the manufacture, regrooving or retreading of tires which are produced or sold in this State, and
for the use of tires on vehicles operated in this State. Section 145-d requires
the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles to promulgate regulations defining the term
snow tire in regard to non-radial tires. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
51.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
